mapper.insert: insert into tbl_coupon (id, coupon_number, coupon_password, coupon_scheme_id, state, use_startdate, use_enddate, generate_time ) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{couponNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{couponPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{couponSchemeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{state,jdbcType=SMALLINT},#{useStartdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{useEnddate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{generateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(c.id) FROM tbl_coupon c LEFT JOIN tbl_order_main om ON c.use_order_number = om.order_main_no WHERE c.coupon_scheme_id=#{couponSchemeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND c.state=2 AND DATE_FORMAT(c.use_time,'%Y-%m-%d')=DATE_FORMAT(#{useDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%Y-%m-%d')
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM tbl_order_main m WHERE DATE_FORMAT(m.order_date,'%Y-%m-%d')=DATE_FORMAT(#{useDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%Y-%m-%d');
